mapper.sql: id, custom_engine_id, start_time, end_time, state, create_by
h.id, h.custom_engine_id, h.start_time, h.end_time, h.state, h.create_by
mapper.select:
select ,en.name engine_name from umc_custom_history h left join umc_custom_engine en on en.id=h.custom_engine_id where en.del_flag!=1
AND en.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
mapper.insert:
insert into umc_custom_history
id,
custom_engine_id,
start_time,
end_time,
state,
create_by,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{customEngineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update umc_custom_history
custom_engine_id = #{customEngineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update umc_custom_history set custom_engine_id = #{customEngineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
